name: Twilight's Basics in Minigames
description:
Welcome to the Minigames! You can play the minigames in order with the Mane 6, but you have to eat the food first in order to get to the minigames.

Credits: 

Khinsider for the Soundtrack

Hasbro for most of the MLP stuff

Joey Perleoni for the Mario Party DS Anti Piracy Music

steph45 for the Original Baldi's Basics in Minigames
